mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animal_profiles (shelter_id, name, species, breed,gender,age,health_status,description,image_url,status,created_at) VALUES (#{shelterId}, #{animalname}, #{species}, #{breed},#{gender},#{age},#{healthStatus},#{description},#{imageUrl},0,NOW());

INSERT INTO audit_records (admin_id,reason,audit_time,target_id, target_type, action ) VALUES ( #{adminId}, #{reason}, #{auditTime}, #{targetId}, #{targetType, typeHandler=com.example.animal_shelet.TypeHandler.Animal.AuditRecordsTypeHandler.TargetTypeTypeHandler}, #{action, typeHandler=com.example.animal_shelet.TypeHandler.Animal.AuditRecordsTypeHandler.ActionTypeHandler}
)
mapper.select: SELECT ap.id, ap.shelter_id AS shelterId, ap.name, ap.species, ap.breed, ap.gender, ap.age, ap.health_status AS healthStatus, ap.description, ap.image_url AS imageUrl, ap.status, ap.created_at AS createdAt, ap.updated_at AS updatedAt, s.shelter_name AS shelterName, s.contact_person AS contactPerson FROM animal_profiles ap JOIN shelters s ON ap.shelter_id = s.id;
